channel.title: Pages on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Syniti Documentation

item.title: Append Utility Columns
item.description: Append Utility Columns Use this page to Append Columns to all Target or Source Tables or Allow Mapping of Utility Columns. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Append Utility Columns in the Navigation pane.

item.title: Copy Targets
item.description: Copy Targets Use this page to Copy a Target in Target Design. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Objectsicon on the Design page. Click the Copy Targetsicon for an Object. Click the Targets to Copy icon on the Select Destination Object For Targets page.

item.title: Criticality
item.description: Criticality Use this page to Add Custom Criticality Levels. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Criticalityin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Database Import
item.description: Database Import Use this page to Import Target Design from a Database. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click Target Importin the Navigationpane. Click the Database Importicon for an Object. Click the Import icon for the DATA SOURCE.

item.title: Design
item.description: Design Use this page to access the pages as described below. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Field Description Objects Click to open the Objects page to access pages to work with Targets for the selected Object, to view all field groups for the selected Object, and to access the Summary Construction dashboard.

item.title: Field Groups
item.description: Field Groups Use this page to Create Field Groups. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Field Groupsin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Metric Groups
item.description: Metric Groups Use this page to Add a Metric Group. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Metric Groupsin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Object Field Groups
item.description: Object Field Groups Use this page to Assign a Field Group to an Object. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Field Group Setupin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Objects
item.description: Objects Use this page to Access Targets at the Object Level. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click Objectsicon on the Design page.

item.title: Required
item.description: Required Use this page to Add Custom Requirement Settings. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Requiredin the Navigationpane.

item.title: Rules: Basic Rule H
item.description: Rules: Basic Rule H Rules: Basic Rule V Use this page to Add a Basic Rule. NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Basic Rulesicon for a Target. Rules Basic Rule V Use this page to Add a Basic Rule.

item.title: Rules: Complex Rule H
item.description: Rules: Complex Rule H Rules: Complex Rule V Use this page to Add a Complex Rule. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Target Rules > Complex Rulesin the Navigationpane. Rules: Complex Rule V Rules: Complex Rule H Use this page to Add a Complex Rule. Field Description Basic Name Displays the unique name of the Complex rule to be documented.

item.title: Rules: Execution Stage Complex Rules
item.description: Rules: Execution Stage Complex Rules Use this page to View Rules Assigned to an Execution Stage. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Target Rules > Execution Stages in the Navigationpane. Click the Complex Rulesicon for a stage.

item.title: Rules: Execution Stage H
item.description: Rules: Execution Stage H Rules: Execution Stage V Use this page to Add an Execution Stage. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Target Rules > Execution Stagesin the Navigationpane. Rules Execution Stage V Rules Execution Stage H Use this page to Add an Execution Stage.

item.title: Rules: Field Complex Rules
item.description: Rules: Field Complex Rules Use this page to Assign theRule to a T Field and Execution Stage. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Fieldsicon for a Target. Click the Complex Rulesicon for a field.

item.title: Select Destination Object For Targets
item.description: Select Destination Object For Targets Use this page to Copy a Target in Target Design. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Objectsicon on the Design page. Click the Copy Targetsicon for an Object.

item.title: Source
item.description: Source Use this page to: View Sources Assigned to Targets. Update System Types for a Source To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Sourcein the Navigationpane.

item.title: Source Where Used
item.description: Source Where Used Use this page to View Target and Source Assignments. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Sourcein the Navigationpane. Click the Targetsicon for a Source.

item.title: System Type Import
item.description: System Type Import Use this page to Import a Target Design from a System Type. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click Target Importin Navigationpane. Click the System Types Importicon for the Object.

item.title: Target Contacts
item.description: Target Contacts Use this page to Add Developers and Business Contacts to a Target or Source. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Developersicon for a Target.

item.title: Target Dependencies
item.description: Target Dependencies Use this page to Set Target Dependencies. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Dependenciesicon for a Target.

item.title: Target Dependency (Children)
item.description: Target Dependency (Children) Use this page to view the dependencies for a Target. Refer to Set Target Dependencies for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Vertical Viewicon for a Target. Click the Child Targetsicon. Field Description CHILD TARGET ID Displays the name of the Target table that has a child dependency with the selected Target (for example, the selected Target is a parent of this Target).

item.title: Target Dependency (Parents)
item.description: Target Dependency (Parents) Use this page to view the dependencies for a Target. Refer to Set Target Dependencies for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Vertical Viewicon for a Target. Click the Parent Targetsicon. Field Description PARENT TARGET ID Displays the name of the Target table that has a parent dependency with the selected Target (for example, the selected Target is a child of this Target).

item.title: Target Dependency Relationship
item.description: Target Dependency Relationship Use this page to Set Target Dependencies. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Dependenciesicon for a Target. Click the Relationshipsicon for a dependency.

item.title: Target Dependency Selection
item.description: Target Dependency Selection Use this page to Set Target Dependencies. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Dependenciesicon for a Target. Click the Find Dependenciesicon.

item.title: Target Design Pending Changes
item.description: Target Design Pending Changes Use this page when Syncing Target Design and Map. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click Pending Design Changeslink in the STATUS OF SYNCfield. NOTE: This link is not available if Target Design and Map are in sync for the selected Target. Field Description TARGET Displays the name of the Target table that has been updated.

item.title: Target Fields H
item.description: Target Fields H Target Fields V Use this page to Add Fields to a Target Activate or Deactivate Target Fields for Mapping Extend Fields to Field Groups NOTE:Bulk Execution has been enabled on this page. Refer to Use Bulk Execution for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Fieldsicon for a Target.

item.title: Target Import Configuration
item.description: Target Import Configuration Use this page to edit the import file data source path if necessary while Importing Target Design from an Excel File. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Import Setupin the Navigationpane. Field Description IMPORT FILE DATASOURCE Displays the data source where the uploaded Excel file is saved before it is imported into Target Design.

item.title: Target Import: Excel Import H
item.description: Target Import: Excel Import H Target Import: Excel Import V Use this page to Import Target Design from an Excel File. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click Target Importin the Navigationpane. Click the Excel Importicon. Target Import Excel Import V Target Import: Excel Import H Use this page to Import Target Design from an Excel File.

item.title: Target Lookup Table H
item.description: Target Lookup Table H Target Lookup Table V Use this page to Set up Lookup Tables. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Lookup Table Setupin the Navigationpane. Target Lookup Table V Target Lookup Table H Use this page to Set up Lookup Tables. Field Description Value Table TypeDisplays an option indicating whether fields in the check table should be value mapped.

item.title: Target Object Import
item.description: Target Object Import Use this page to access the pages as described below for the selected Object. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Target Importicon in the Navigationpane.

item.title: Target Object Import: Database
item.description: Target Object Import: Database Use this page to Import Target Design from a Database. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click Target Importin the Navigationpane. Click the Database Importicon.

item.title: Target Object Import: System Types
item.description: Target Object Import: System Types Use this page to Import a Target Design from a System Type. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click Target Importin the Navigationpane. Click the System Types Importicon.

item.title: Target Source Contacts
item.description: Target Source Contacts Use this page to Add Developers and Business Contacts to a Source. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Click the Developersicon for a Source.

item.title: Target Sources H
item.description: Target Sources H Target Sources V Use this page to Assign a Source to a Target. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Sourcesicon for a Target. Target Sources V Target Sources H NOTE:Fields display on this page based on the type of Source selected. If the Source is {Full Construction}, use this page to Update Completed Status of Records for a Construct Page.

item.title: Target Table Join
item.description: Target Table Join This page is used to document joins in the Target tables. Refer to Add Relationship Joins to Sources for more information. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Click the Vertical Viewicon for a Target. Click the Target Table Joinicon.

item.title: Target Type
item.description: Target Type This page displays the Target Types installed with the platform. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Target Typein the Navigationpane.

item.title: Targets H
item.description: Targets H Targets V Use this page to: Sync Map and Target Design Add a Basic Rule Set a Target’s Design Status Set Target Dependencies To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Click the Targetsicon on the Design page. Targets V Targets H Use this page to Set the Field Formats for Date, Time, and Decimal For Use in Data Services AutoGen.

item.title: Utility Field Defaults
item.description: Utility Field Defaults Use this page to Add Utility Field Defaults. To access this page: Select dspMigratein the Navigationpane. Select Design in the Context bar. Select Configuration > Utility Field Defaults in the Navigation pane. Field Description NAME Displays the name that displays in the DEFAULT VALUE list box on the Append Utility Column page. DEFAULT VALUE Displays the default value associated with the name.
